website_summaries.verdict: Built with the signature split outsole, the Reebok Split Fuel pays homage to the brand’s classic shoes. Up to this day, the one-of-a-kind split outsole tech still brings nothing but excellent comfort and stability while being lightweight to one’s feet.The Reebok Split Fuel’s distinctive, chunky silhouette amazed a multitude of shoppers.  The Split Fuel of Reebok possesses a range of impressive features, all coming in at a budget-friendly price.
pros: The Reebok Split Fuel looks terrific on feet, according to the majority of buyers
A pair is within a budget-friendly price range
Plenty of Reebok Split Fuel reviews have highlighted the sneaker’s excellent comfort
Its wide toe box is a delight to a handful of users who want their feet to have more wiggle room
Several wearers consider the Split Fuel to be lightweight
Several buyers proudly share about receiving tons of compliments wearing the sneaker
One customer comments that Reebok Split Fuel is also great for walking outdoors
cons: The Split Fuel is hard and inflexible to walk in, according to some reviewers
It has little to no arch support, quite a couple of users have observed

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but...
customer_reviews.text: I like Reeboks generally because they're comfortable. In my experience they're not as durable as Adidas and not as flashy as Nikes. You figure an unstructured, mostly textile sneaker like this would be form-fitting and comfortable as a slipper. Nope. No arch support, flimsy insole. They DO look cool, but uncomfortable shoes, no matter how cool they look, are pretty useless cuz ya just won't wear em. Form follows function.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Women's Split Fuel
customer_reviews.text: Reebok Women's Split Fuel ordered womens 12 they had to be 29cm but recived 39cm in mens size. I cant return them cause made a gift. What the matter guys? You dont know what you are selling?
customer_reviews.author: Brodiagska

customer_reviews.title: Colors differs in Men/Women’s sizes; adjust accordingly
customer_reviews.text: This specific color (black & white) shoe is a men’s size. I wear a 9 1/2 in women, but ordered an 8 in men. It fitted as expected. In the photo; I ordered the same size with the gray & pink shoe. But it was women’s size, you can see the difference in the photo. I just sent the gray & pink shoe back and adjusted the size to the women size for the pink & gray shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Man size, true fit
customer_reviews.text: light weight, well built. It took a few days for my feet to get used to the fit.... so if it doesn't feel right after a day or two, don't give up, you're going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes I will have to get a new pair of sneakers because I basically wore these shoes out. But I got so many compliments. They were comfortable. They got her quick. They lasted quite a bit. I was very impressed. Like I said the only reason I'm getting a new pair is because I wore these puppies out. I highly recommend. I'm going to check to see if there's more styles/colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Amberlavage

customer_reviews.title: Great for leg day
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Women’s Size Seven and that’s what I typically wear - 7 in adidas and vans and 7.5 in mikes. They fit great! I got them for squats and working out, and they are hard soled and elevated in the back like I wanted. Colors are super cute and bright too!
customer_reviews.author: kpc0035

customer_reviews.title: Surprised to Love These
customer_reviews.text: They run a bit large but I use an orthotic. The plastic was a bit off-putting but they're great on a rainy day and comfortable for lounging/casual wear. I wouldn't recommend for running,
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Size runs bigger
customer_reviews.text: I sent the first pair back as they run on the larger side and when I received the 2nd pair and they are somewhat big but I am going to keep them. I don't think they are very sturdy made, seems to be a cheap pair of sneakers. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Simonton

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but poor fit!
customer_reviews.text: I order a size smaller because they said that they fit large. But wow they were still like 2 sizes too big!
customer_reviews.author: fonda hill

customer_reviews.title: Not a women size
customer_reviews.text: It’s not women size ... it’s men size so it’s too big
customer_reviews.author: Liza Manzur

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly happy
customer_reviews.text: Since buying these shoes, my daughter wears them EVERYDAY!!! They look good on her feet and she says they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Too large due to unisex sizing—not women’s sizing
customer_reviews.text: The product is listed as a women’s shoe but it is unisex sizing. So obviously when I ordered my normal women’s size it was too large. I ordered to different pair and both were listed as women’s but were unisex. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey L Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers. Great price and super comfortable. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Beware, these are sized in men’s sizes
customer_reviews.text: They look cool but are actually men’s sizes.. disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light
customer_reviews.text: Loving these shoes, very confortable and extremely light. When I first take the box I thought that there was nothing inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good comfort while walking/running/jogging. Slightly oversize but manageable. There is little sweating of feet due to mesh. Sole of shoe is sturdy and strong!
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Not women's
customer_reviews.text: It says women's on the title but product is unisex. I bought Size 11 thinking it would fit me (I'm a man, my feet are 28 cm), they run large. Gonna return.
customer_reviews.author: Hakan A.

customer_reviews.title: Top Big
customer_reviews.text: I did not like them at all, I bought the size I use regularly and they are huge
customer_reviews.author: REIMAR ARIAS

customer_reviews.title: not true to size
customer_reviews.text: the back of the shoe is up my leg to high
customer_reviews.author: Pam Amerson

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair I returned the first pair for the same reason I'm writing this post. They are CHEAPLY made. The material doesn't last. Starts splitting, tearing! PASS!! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jawisha Bradley

product_meta.title: Reebok Mens Split Fuel Fabric Low Top Lace Up Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Combine your workouts and split up your soles with the versatile Reebok® Split Fuel sneakers. Best for casual wear and light training. Seamless stretchy mesh upper for lightweight, breathable support. Heat-pressed crosscheck detail at the side. Low-cut design for freedom of motion and quicker transitions. 3D Ultralite midsole for lightweight cushioning. Carbon rubber rim under the toe and heel for strategic traction. Durable synthetic outsole with interdependent front and back split sole construction with TPU stability plate. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Combine your workouts and split up your soles with the versatile Reebok® Split Fuel sneakers.
Best for casual wear and light training.
Seamless stretchy mesh upper for lightweight, breathable support.
Heat-pressed crosscheck detail at the side.

Low-cut design for freedom of motion and quicker transitions. 3D Ultralite midsole for lightweight cushioning. Carbon rubber rim under the toe and heel for strategic traction. Durable synthetic outsole with interdependent front and back split sole construction with TPU stability plate. Imported.
